tool_description: Upload unlimited files on anonymous server with 100% of security.
name: anonfiles
title: anonfiles

api_list.name: geFiletInfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anonfiles.p.rapidapi.com/v2/file/PdwcP7d6x0/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anonfiles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anonfiles.p.rapidapi.com/v2/file/{file_id}/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anonfiles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
